__TOC__

A HeartBeat in the computer world is a regular (every second,minute,hour) signal or pinging of a system or service to ensure it is still running.

For example you could set up a CronJob of
<pre>
wget http:<yourhomepage>
</pre>
to run every 10 minutes and then send you an SMS you if your ISP was down !

See http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/heartbeat
